actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to clarify the applicability of authority to release restrictions and encumbrances on certain property located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Maritime Commission Authorization Act of 1990 to revise the property description of certain land and improvements located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana, which were the subject of a release of restrictions by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the applicability of authority to release restrictions and encumbrances on certain property located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana.
